org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class opencv_calib3d.StereoBM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_calib3d.StereoBM
  • Enclosing class:
    opencv_calib3d

    public static class opencv_calib3d.StereoBM
extends Pointer
    Block Matching Stereo Correspondence Algorithm The class implements BM stereo correspondence algorithm by K. Konolige.
